key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges related to the proposed sale to Siemens
Cybersecurity risks due to reliance on cloud-based solutions
Economic sensitivity and customer concentration in vulnerable industries
Intense competitive pressures from established and emerging players
controversies: Investigation by multiple law firms for potential breaches of fiduciary duties and unfair terms to shareholders
Potential antitrust concerns and regulatory scrutiny over the Siemens deal
Significant penalties imposed if Altair accepts a competing bid, raising fairness concerns
governance_issues: Concerns over shareholder fairness and potential undervaluation in the Siemens deal
Questions about the fairness of transaction terms and fiduciary duties
